## Input data from clipboard

Copy the tables of GFP, OD, Sample names etc. in excel and run the command below to get it into R

```{r input data}
s1 <- paste_plate_to_column()
ui1 <- paste_plate_to_column()
i1 <- paste_plate_to_column()

merged_data <- bind_cols(s1,ui1,i1) #%>% group_by(Samples)
merged1 <- merged_data %>%   select(3,6,9) %>% rename(Uninduced = `GFP/RFP`, Induced = 'GFP/RFP1') %>% gather(Induction, `GFP/RFP`,-Samples)
```

Doing calculations with the tables, relating sample names with the values

## Plotting

Plotting

```{r plotting, echo=FALSE}
merged1 %>% ggplot(aes(Samples,`GFP/RFP`)) + geom_point(aes(color = Induction)) -> plt
plt %<>% format_classic(.) %>% format_logscale()
plt
```
